categories: Category:Sith in the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: Turg was a member of the Lost Tribe of Sith born approximately 0 ABY. He joined the Tribe's armada, becoming a crewmember of the Starstalker under Captain Vyn Holpur. He took part in the attempt to acquire samples of wintrium from the Fountain of Ancients on Klatooine, where he fought and killed many Klatooinian guards before several Hutts interfered, attacking the Starstalker and taking the Sith captive. Later, Holpur and the rest of the crew, including Turg, were condemned to death for violating the Fountain.
